text: What suffering will you make us bear?
Can you find it in your heart to listen to my plea?
I come to you against my better judgement.
Will you help me ease the suffering of my people?
Would you listen to me, friend?
I have but an humble request.
I'm sorry, it is not possible for us.
Tho it pains me I must decline, my dearest friend.
This is beyond my abilities I'm afraid.
What a find day to be ali-... to... to... sorry... (sobs)
I do not know what to say.
From the bottom of my heart... my... Thank you.
I trust you will remain reasonable.
Was I not... a good girl?
No, no, no, no, no, no...
Let us not be strangled by those painful bonds any further.
Help us, child, I bed of you.
Don't abandon us in our time of greatest need!
A gesture of good will maybe?
Would you care to listen to my offer?
I have an offer that you may find agreeable.
Once upon a time one of my smiles would have been enough. Now...
Let's work together to end the suffering.
The world would be a better place if we could all set aside our... ressentment... (inaudible mumbling)
No... I can't... I can't stand this anymore...
If it will end this faster, I will help.
A quick resolution will lower the suffering.
I wish I could offer more...
To what do I owe the honour?
No, you've inflicted too much pain on us.
crazy laughter your torments will be endless, as were mine!
I do not feel this would benefit us.
I'd rather we kept our freedom.
Me and my children are more happy this way.
See how ugly I am! This is the face of your fate!
Wouldn't the great Nagash say: "Death comes for all"?
I beg of you, stop! (in a crying tone)
I won't wait for you to strike us down.
